sections.heading: Ph.D. Hooding Ceremony (May 15)
sections.text: The Ph.D. Hooding Ceremony will take place on Friday, May 15, at McCormick Auditorium in Hermann Hall on Mies Campus beginning at 10:30 a.m. (CDT).

sections.heading: Illinois Tech Commencement (May 16)
sections.text: There will be two separate, combined college-level ceremonies held on Saturday, May 16, 2026. The first combined ceremony will begin at 9 a.m. (CDT). The second combined ceremony will begin at 2 p.m. (CDT). The colleges for each ceremony will be confirmed during the spring semester. College Ceremony One 7 a.m.—Student and faculty check-in begins 8 a.m.—Doors open (all guests must arrive prior to 8:45 a.m. and will need a ticket to enter) 9 a.m.—The first college ceremony begins College Ceremony Two Noon—Student and faculty check-in begins 1 p.m.—Doors open (all guests must arrive prior to 1:45 p.m. and will need a ticket to enter) 2 p.m.—The second college ceremony begins All May 16 Commencement celebrations will be held at Credit Union 1 Arena .

sections.heading: Chicago-Kent Commencement (May 17)
sections.text: The Chicago-Kent College of Law Commencement ceremony will take place on Sunday, May 17, 2026, at The Isadore and Sadie Dorin Forum—UIC Forum . For more information, please visit the Chicago-Kent Commencement website .

sections.heading: College or academic department-specific questions?
sections.text: Contact the appropriate College Ceremony planner with any college or academic department-specific questions related to your specific ceremony.
